name: BugOut
detailed_description:
WARNING: THIS GAME IS EARLY ACCESS ALPHA. PLEASE DO NOT PURCHASE IT UNLESS YOU WANT TO ACTIVELY SUPPORT DEVELOPMENT OF THE GAME AND ARE PREPARED TO HANDLE WITH SERIOUS ISSUES AND POSSIBLE INTERRUPTIONS OF GAME FUNCTIONING.

Short Description

A Modern Day Survival Simulator

In BugOut you will be challenged by many real-life scenarios to test your skills and push your limits.
No hospital, no way out, and no friends to save you.
How many days can you survive?


A Modern Day Survival Simulator


In BugOut you will be challenged by many real-life scenarios to test your skills and push your limits.

No hospital, no way out, and no friends to save you.

Many of us have a BugOut bag in the corner or sitting by the door, but what will happen the day you have to use it?

Are you prepared?

Do you have the skills to survive?

Do you have the items you need?


Once you start the challenge your only option is life or death.

As a BugOut survivor, you have a survival rating of 1 to 100.

Pick your location, pick your BugOut gear and start your challenge.

If you die during your challenge, the challenge is over.

Your survival rating is adjusted based on your performance and time survived.

How many days can you survive?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: I5 3.2ghz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB video card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or Better
  • Processor: I7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB Video Card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
